name: Drift Race
description:
Rope Drift Race is the best inter-finger drift game!

Role is simple:
Enter the corner and press your finger, leave the corner and raise your finger to complete the drift!
Leave the track and the game is over.
Only real masters and super sports cars can easily surpass other racing cars

Features:
◉ Well-designed racing cars, tracks and rules。
◉ Two modes,More challenge.
◉ Tablet support
◉ Global Leaderboards

Rope Drift Race is Suit for all age and completely FREE to play!
Now play and become the best driver in world!
